name: Eleven The Game
description:
Release Date 4th July 2019

A fan made Stranger Things Game.

Using telekinesis and the ability to flip between this world and the upside down, help Eleven find her way out of Byer's house. 

A small taste of a platform game made by a fan of Stranger Things.  Play as Eleven, with the power to make things hover, shake, and transition back and forth to the Upside Down. Find your way out of the Byer's house without getting eaten by the demogorgon!
